channel.title: Azure on Get Amongst It!!
channel.description: Recent content in Azure on Get Amongst It!!

item.title: Setting up Octopus Deploy with a Service Principal - Azure CLI
item.description: I just was chatting to my mate Rob Pearson who was giving me some tips on setting up Azure with Octopus Deploy. In my case I was trying to set up a service account to do some deployments. I had already created a service account within my Active Directory with the relevant permissions. Rob pointed me to the Octopus Deploy docoumentation but I was struggling with the Azure Portal.
